alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gadsden, central Leon, southeastern Decatur, Grady and western Thomas Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Thomasville to 7 miles east of Havana to 7 miles southeast of Greensboro. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Thomasville, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Cairo, Ochlocknee, Tallahassee Comm College, Gretna, Attapulgus, Douglas City, Dillon, Florence, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Iamonia, Laingkat, Calvary, Princes Still and Quincy Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
